chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 13 Pro is experiencing the following issue:

The package is declared delivered, but I haven't received anything. Is there a problem?

Thank you for your help,

Hi there,

The recipient of this order claims they haven't received it, even though the tracking shows up as delivered. 

We have asked the customer to look for their package in case it was delivered to a neighbor or family member. If they can't find the package, we asked them to provide the Certificate of Non-receipt and their ID.

Dear Backcare,

Can you kindly check with the customer whether the parcel has been delivered to their neighbours or family. If not, please provide us with a hand written CND as well as the customer's ID. We have informed our logistics partner regarding this matter. In the meantime please do not refund the cusotmer. Thank you.

Regards,
CH

Dear Backcare,

I have attached the POD in this message. Thank you.

Regards,
AS

Hello ecomobile,

The customer informs us that the package has just been delivered.

Yours truly,

Anja from BackMarket customer service.
